pageProduct.name: Pentavite Vitamin D3 & K2 Kids Liquid 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pentavite® Vitamin D3 & K2 Kids Liquid is a premium formulation containing Vitamin D3 & Vitamin K2, to support strong bones and teeth in children.

Vitamin D3 helps the body absorb dietary calcium while Vitamins D3 and K2 help support bone mineralisation. Pentavite® Vitamin D3 & K2 Kids Liquid is a great tasting formula that kids will love! 
  • No added sugar 
  • No added artificial colours or flavours 
  • No added dairy 
  • No added gluten 
  • No added fructose 
  • Vegetarian friendly 
Dedicated to Children's Health

Suitable For: Kids 1 - 12 years old, Vegetarian.

Product Claims: Maintains strong bones & teeth

Size: 30mL

Dermatologist Tested?: n/a

Dermatologically Tested?: n/a

Soap-Free?: n/a

SPF: n/a

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Maintains strong bones & teeth
• Supports dietary calcium absorption
• Maintains healthy immune system function
• Supports muscle health and muscle function
• Supports vitamin D levels in the body when sun exposure is inadequate
• Supports general health and wellbeing

Ingredients

Contains: Each dose contains:
0.5mL (1-3 yrs)
Vitamin D3 (Colecalciferol): 5 microgram (200 IU)
Vitamin K2 (Menaquinone 7): 6.25 microgram

1mL (4-12 yrs)
Vitamin D3 (Colecalciferol): 10 microgram (400 IU)
Vitamin K2 (Menaquinone 7): 12.5 microgram

Directions

Direction for use:
Administer dose via syringe provided, directly into child's mouth or add to food or drink. Rinse syringe when finished and allow to dry.

USAGE ADVICE

Do not use if seal around cap is broken or missing. Pentavite® Vitamin D3 & K2 Kids Liquid is recommended for children over 1 year of age.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store upright and below 25°C. Secure bottle cap tightly.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
